text: Serge Letchimy (born 13 January 1953) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the island of Martinique's 3rd constituency since June 2007, and is a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche parliamentary group. Letchimy is a member of the Martinican Progressive Party (PPM), or Parti progressiste martiniquais. He was the successor of Aimé Césaire as Mayor of Fort de France from 2001 to 2010 and was the final President of the Regional Council of Martinique from 26 March 2010 until its replacement by the Assembly of Martinique in December 2015. ==References== == External links == * le site officiel de serge letchimy * Le site Internet officiel du PPM * « L'alchimie Letchimy » Dossier de L'Express, 11 novembre 2004 * page on the French National Assembly website Category:1953 births Category:Black French politicians Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Regional Council of Martinique Category:Mayors of places in Martinique Category:Martinican Progressive Party politicians Category:Martiniquais politicians Category:French people of Martiniquais descent Category:Martiniquais people of Indian descent Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Serge Letchimy
